alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Haskell; Jones; Nolan; Shackelford; Taylor; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 03 at 7:14PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will continue to impact portions of the Big Country through 800 PM CDT... At 711 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking several strong thunderstorms extending from Throckmorton south to Albany and Anson, and then south Merkel and Nolan. All of these storms were moving east at 30 mph and will be capable of producing small hail and wind gusts over 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Clyde, Stamford, Anson, Albany, Baird, Throckmorton, Wylie, Nolan, Merkel, Tye, Tuscola, Hawley, Buffalo Gap, Lueders, Trent, Lawn, Moran, Woodson and Noodle. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 258 and 311. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Callahan; Haskell; Jones; Nolan; Shackelford; Taylor; Throckmorton
